parts.text: What machine learning model would you recommend for customer churn prediction?

For customer churn prediction, I recommend: 1) XGBoost or LightGBM as the primary model - they handle tabular data well and provide feature importance. 2) Features to include: customer tenure, transaction frequency, support ticket history, product usage metrics, and demographic data. 3) Handle class imbalance using SMOTE or weighted loss functions. 4) Use time-based validation splits to avoid data leakage. 5) Ensemble with Random Forest for robustness. 6) Consider SHAP values for model interpretability. Expected performance: 85-90% AUC-ROC with proper feature engineering. Deploy with real-time scoring API for proactive intervention.
